metadata.title: CVE-2018-19777 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In Artifex MuPDF 1.14.0, there is an infinite loop in the function svg_dev_end_tile in fitz/svg-device.c, as demonstrated by mutool.

criterions.comment: mupdf package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.15.0+ds1-1').
